summary.span: 运行时显示目录和路径。

span.span: Displays directories and paths at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控件显示目录的层次结构列表。Use this control to display a hierarchical list of directories. 例如，您可以创建对话框，以使用户能够从所有可用目录的文件列表中打开文件。You can create dialog boxes that, for example, enable a user to open a file from a list of files in all available directories. 设置 、 和属性， 使用户能够访问列表中的项。Set the , , and properties to enable a user to access items in a list. 如果还显示了 和 控件，则可以编写代码以将它们与 控件和彼此同步。If you also display the and controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the control and with each other. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

summary.span: 在 控件的内容更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the contents of a control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `Change` 控件中的选定内容更改时 ，当用户双击新目录或 通过代码更改属性设置时，将发生此事件。The `Change` event occurs when the selection in a control changes, either when the user double-clicks a new directory or when you change the property setting through code. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以访问列表项。Use this property to access list items. `DirList`属性与和属性一起工作 。The `DirList` property works together with the and properties. 对于 控件，当在 `Index` 运行时创建控件时，编号序列基于当前目录和子目录。For a control, the `Index` number sequence is based on the current directories and subdirectories when the control is created at run time. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性返回当前选定目录的索引。Use this property to return the index of the currently selected directory. `DirListIndex`属性与和属性一起工作 。The `DirListIndex` property works together with the and properties. 表达式 `instance.DirList(instance.DirListIndex)` 返回当前选定目录的字符串。The expression `instance.DirList(instance.DirListIndex)` returns the string for the currently selected directory. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (Disposing As Boolean)

param.name: Disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 控件使用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a control and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，释放参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在释放参数设置为的情况调用 `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 当释放参数为时 `true` ，此方法将释放此控件引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时 ，请确保不引用以前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When you override , make sure not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

Protected Overridable Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)
.method familyvirtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). `OnBackColorChanged`方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The `OnBackColorChanged` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用 基类的方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的当前路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the current path in a control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示当前选定目录的路径。

span.span: A that represents the path of the currently selected directory.

value.span: 如果在运行时创建控件，则默认值为当前路径。

span.span: The default is the current path when the control is created at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在生成应用程序的文件浏览和操作功能时使用此属性。Use this property when you are building an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities. 设置 `Path` 属性时，其效果类似于 MS-DOS 命令的效果 `chdir` ; 使用或不使用驱动器规范启用了相对路径。When you set the `Path` property, the effects are similar to the effects of the MS-DOS `chdir` command; relative paths are enabled with or without a drive specification. 如果仅指定带有冒号 (： ) 的驱动器，则该驱动器上的当前目录处于选中状态。If you specify only a drive with a colon (:),the current directory on that drive is selected. `Path`使用以下语法，还可以将属性设置为无驱动器连接的合格网络路径：The `Path` property can also be set to a qualified network path without a drive connection using the following syntax: ``` \\servername\sharename\path ``` 更改控件的值会 `Path` 生成一个 事件。Changing the value of `Path` for a control generates an event. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
